description: The Correctional Service Canada has a requirement to provide services from a licensed physician with a specialty in psychiatry (referred to herein as a psychiatrist) for the Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorder (FASD) assessment Team of the Regional Treatment Center in the Ontario Region. The Contractor (Psychiatrist) will provide psychiatric care services to offenders and collaborate with the inter-disciplinary health services team that includes, but is not limited to Nurses, Pharmacists, Nurse Practitioners, Social Workers, Dietitians, Dentists, Psychologists, and other medical and allied healthcare professionals.",
full_summary:
# Fetal Alchol Spectrum Disorder Diagnostic Team - Psychiatrist

## Classification Information

* Reference Number: cb-809-7111214
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: 21415-27-4471844
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: None
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

## Contract Information

* Contracting Entity Name: Correctional Services Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 445 Union Street, Kingston, Ontario, K7L4Y8 Canada
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 31, 2026
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Danielle Murdoch
	+ Email: [danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 422-4831

## Tender Description

The Correctional Service Canada has a requirement to provide psychiatric services for the Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorder (FASD) assessment team at the Regional Treatment Center in Ontario. A licensed physician with a specialty in psychiatry is required to provide psychiatric care services to offenders and collaborate with the interdisciplinary health services team.

Objectives:

* Provide and actively participate in the coordination of essential mental health services to offenders at the Regional Treatment Center as a psychiatrist
* Assist in the FASD diagnostic team and provide all aspects of interviewing and assessing a patient for FASD

Deliverables:

* Participate as a team member on the FASD diagnostic team at the Regional Treatment Center
* Provide all services in accordance with the National Essential Health Services Framework and any amendments issued by CSC during the contract period

## Documents

You can find more information and the application form on the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26772/rfp---21415-27-4471844---fasd-psychiatry---rtc%E2%80%93o.pdf


Note that the service will be funded by Correctional Services Canada and valued at approximately 45,000 per year. 
This professional version of tender is only share with authorized personnel. Please respect the tender fees and ownership.
